title: Privacy Policy
intro: At Swifthaul Logistics, we value your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your data when you use our services.

sections.heading: 1. Information We Collect
sections.description: We may collect the following information when you use our services:
items: Personal details (name, phone number, email, address).
Delivery details (pickup and drop-off addresses, package description).
Communication details (chats, emails, or calls with our support team).

sections.heading: 2. How We Use Your Information
items: Improve our services and customer experience.

sections.heading: 3. Sharing of information
sections.description: We do not sell or rent your personal information. However, we may share it with:
items: Authorized delivery riders and staff for completing bookings.
Legal Auhtorities if required by law
Third-party service providers (e.g payment processors) strictly for service purposes.

sections.heading: 4. Data Security
sections.description: We take reasonable measures to protect your information from unauthorized access, loss or misuse. However, no method of electronic transmission is 100% secure.

sections.heading: 5. Your Rights
items: Access the personal data we hold about you
Request deletion of your data (Subject to legal requirements)

sections.heading: 6. Cookies & Tracking
sections.description: Our website may use cookies to improve user experience. You can disbale cookies in your browser settings.

sections.heading: 7. Updates to this Policy
sections.description: We may update this Privay Policy occasionally. Any changes will be posted on this page with the revised effective date.

sections.heading: *. Contact Us
sections.description: For questions about this Privacy Policy
